column5: Hi,  Looking for advise/recommendations for renting an ice hut on Lake Simoe (Cooks Bay area).  Girlfriend and I are looking to try and we've never been before.  Any recommendations on a reputable outfitter is appreciated - we're hoping to get out over the next couple weeks.  Thanks in advance.
Simcoe fishing adventures is a good one. Whitey and Wifey run a good show.Simcoe message board has his website address.
The only one id go with !  http://simcoefishingadventures.com/
